doc.title: Seven Generations
doc.plot: "What we do today affects the world seven generations from today," states the Indian shaman as he sets out to change the course of history by bringing together a young man and woman from different tribes, to avoid war and create peace through love. "I have seen the future, and the future is destructive, unless we change it today," he declares just before dawn. He then sets about intentionally co-creating with spirit to create the tomorrow of his dreams. Kenneth Feinberg promotes a message that is important for us today, as we make decisions that will affect humanity for Seven Generations.
